content: reached the end of the hdc3lp around your hat - 11 the bewitching hour hat pattern is the property of amethyst mermaidesigns please do not distribute the pattern as your own or change anything and say it is your own design you may sell any physical items made from the pattern but please use the original name and credit me as the designer permission is not given for mass production factory of any kind of this design as always thank you so much for purchasing my pattern i love to see all your creations please share your finished work on instagram using the hashtag #amethystmermaidesigns feel free to give me a tag for a feature in my stories as well
